mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: David Higgenbotham has paid off his mortgage to Short and wishes an acknowledgement of the fact from him; Jefferson shares most recent news from France, including the establishment of a colony in Senegal; mentions that he "endeavoring to establish a college in Albemarle" that will hopefully become the state university.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1817 June 19, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to [William] Short, n.p.
